title: shAradE namastubhyam
sahitya:
shaTrE tirumbum shellap-piLLAi kaTrE kuzhal ishaiya kadir mukham kATTa


anupallavi

  paTraTrun kazhal paTrum enakkirangi enraikkum unnaDimai Ezh piravik-kaDal tANDa


caraNam    munnamarnda dEvi mukham kaNDu mayangi nirkkum unnazhagaik-kaNDu pErAnadam kONDiDa
 pinnazhagaik-kaNDu perum tavam sheidu ninru un nAmam uraittazhaikkum en Aval tIrttiDa
